Mexico passes #USMCA today making it the 1st country to ratify. The U.S. must follow suit—starting in the House of Reps. The U.S. needs certainty and reliability when trading with our neighbors. The USMCA delivers both for #AZ, our country, and our 2 biggest trading partners.
